    • About Prashant Vanka


    Prashant Vanka is an astute real estate advisor and has been recognized as a top 30 Agent at Intero Real Estate (2016) and as a part of the No. 1 national sales team for KW (2014), selling over $179 Million of residential real estate. Besides helping identify investment properties, Prashant and his team know how to create inventory in a low turnover market, navigating and executing in one of the most competitive markets in the country.

    Growing up in Silicon Valley and continuing his education at Cal Poly - San Luis Obispo with a concentration in Finance and emphasis in Econometrics helps him understand clients better. Prashant offers clients top quality service, responds to email and phone enquiries promptly.
